short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically filters and sorts your Google Play Console app list for seamless organization and quick access.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension automatically filters by type (e.g., Production, In Review) and applies sorting options (e.g., Last Updated, App Status) in Google Play Console.

Automatically filters and sorts your Google Play Console app list for seamless organization and quick access.

Enhance your Google Play Console experience with the 'Google Play Console Auto Filter' browser extension. Effortlessly streamline your app list by automatically applying default filters and sorts, optimizing organization and accessibility. This powerful tool simplifies app management, ensuring efficiency and ease in monitoring your app status, including production, in review, and more.
